content: I've moved to a separate topic thread.

@Lloyd McKenzie Thanks!

The question is next:
Is it correct in this form ( http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-coverage-type.html ) to use the "EHCPOL" code if the patient has a Russian voluntary health insurance policy, and the "MANDPOL" code if the patient has Russian compulsory health insurance policy?
This question was already asked (and answered) here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/FHIR.20-.20correct.20using.20codes.20of.20valueset.20coverage.20type
Andrey Alabin has marked this topic as resolved.
